headline.main: ENEMY SHIPS RACED TO DOOM OFF SAVO; Connecticut Naval Officer Describes Battle Off Island in Solomons Oct. 11-12

lead_paragraph: PEARL HARBOR, Nov. 2 (AP) -- A forty-minute battle the night of Oct. 11-12, in which possibly nine Japanese warships were sunk, was described vividly today by Captain Ernest Gregor Small of New Haven, Conn.
abstract: Capt E G Small describes Oct 11-12 naval battle near Savo Is
snippet: PEARL HARBOR, Nov. 2 (AP) -- A forty-minute battle the night of Oct. 11-12, in which possibly nine Japanese warships were sunk, was described vividly today by Captain Ernest Gregor Small of New Haven, Conn....
